problem.markdown:
In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the eyes?
[[Motherboard, CPU/Processor, RAM, (Video Card), Power Supply, Hard Disk, Optical Drive]]
[explanation] The Video Card is like the eye of the machine because it handles all visual information. [explanation]
problem.p: In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the eyes?

div.p: The Video Card is like the eye of the machine because it handles all visual information.
